dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4982 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1444 Main Street in Ramona, California, as the “Archie Moore Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Issa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1444 Main Street in Ramona, California, as the Archie Moore Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1444 Main Street in Ramona, California, shall be known and designated as the Archie Moore Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Archie Moore Post Office Building.
